Raza Jaffrey is straight. He is sexy and many gay men wish he was gay. If you like him, just say it: I Ain't Ashamed of My Man Crush. He has black hair. Scroll down and check out his athletic body, short and/or medium black hairstyles & haircuts.

2 Ways to Vote him Up!

2. Tell us "why you have a crush on him"

Refresh this page to see the "Crushers" increase after you "Like" or vote.
